target_url.description: Starting URL for the crawler (e.g., the main listing page)

listing_selectors.description: Listing page selectors from Selector Agent output. Expected structure: {listing_container: [...], article_link: [...]}

listing_container.description: Selector chain for listing container (array of {selector, success_rate} or strings)

article_link.description: Selector chain for article links (array of {selector, success_rate} or strings)

detail_selectors.description: Detail page selectors from Selector Agent output. Expected structure: {title: [...], content: [...], date: [...], ...}

additionalProperties.description: Selector chain for this field - array of {selector, success_rate} objects or strings

max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl

requires_browser.description: Whether JavaScript rendering is required for this site
